name: Plant Warfare
description:
You play as a plant boy that wants to get out of the small garden and does so by taking down the rest of his friends and even going so far as to deal with the gardener himself!

Complete each level by killing all the enemies and collecting any key items. The end of each level is to the far right.

(Pre-warning we have title music make sure your speakers aren't too loud)

Controls:

WASD - To move

E- To Interact

Left Click - To Attack
